title: 2015년 Lester Broussard, Jr. v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Lester Broussard, Jr. v. State. 판결일: 2015-06-04. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Lester Broussard, Jr. v. State
**판결일**: 2015-06-04
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                            TENTH COURT OF APPEALS

Chief Justice
    Tom Gray

Justice
     Rex D. Davis
     Al Scoggins

                          McLennan County Courthouse
                         501 Washington Avenue, Rm 415
                            Waco, Texas 76701-1373
            Phone: (254) 757-5200              Fax: (254) 757-2822



                    Clerk
     Sharri Roessler
                                       
                                 June 4, 2015
                                       


In accordance with the enclosed Memorandum Opinion, below is the judgment in the numbered cause set out herein to be entered in the Minutes of this Court as of the 4[th] day of June, 2015.

10-14-00285-CR	LESTER BROUSSARD, JR. v. THE STATE OF TEXAS - ON APPEAL FROM THE 12[TH] DISTRICT COURT OF WALKER COUNTY - TRIAL COURT NO. 25424  -  AFFIRMED - Memorandum Opinion by Justice Scoggins:

	"This cause came on to be heard on the transcript of the record of the Court below, and the same being considered, because it is the opinion of this Court that there was no error in the judgment, it is ordered, adjudged and decreed by the Court that the judgment be in all things affirmed, and that the appellant pay all costs in this behalf expended and that this decision be certified below for observance."



...
